direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add elements to the bag, but the latter allows specifying the count of elements to add.
Both methods involve adding elements to the bag, but addAll adds multiple elements from a collection.
Both methods modify the bag by either adding or removing elements.
Both methods involve modifying the bag by either adding or removing multiple elements.
Both methods modify the bag by either adding elements or retaining only specific elements.
Both methods involve checking the contents of the bag against a collection, though one modifies and the other queries.
